Class Loans

  • java.lang.Object
    • Loans

  • public class Loans
extends java.lang.Object
    The Loans class contains methods to record and return users' loan details.
    Version:
    2017.11.19
    Author:
    Li Tang

      Loans()
      create a loans to record users' loan detail.
